#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    unsigned long long f[21];
    f[0]=1;
    for(int i=1;i<21;i++)
    {
        f[i] = i*f[i-1];
    }
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        unsigned long long ans = 0;
        for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(i%2)
                ans = ans-(f[n]/f[i]);
            else
                ans = ans+(f[n]/f[i]);
        }
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
